title: Tutorial
story: It is the year 1535, you and your friend went out in the forest to collect some berries and hunt some deer. You split up to increase the chances of finding berries, and report back after two hours. You wait for your friend for a long time, but thereâ€™s no sign of him.

forest-entrance.name: Forest Entrance
forest-entrance.story: You're standing at the forest entrance where you decided to meet up. Behind you is the village you're from, but your mind is set on the forest where your lost friend went.

directions.story: There's a path going deeper into the forest, the path your friend went into initially.

forest-crossroads.story: You're now at a crossroads where the path goes either left to the North or right to the South.

directions.story: When you look in the distance going North, you see an old ruin.
The path to the south is going out of the forest towards the beach.

arnoud-krabbius.name: Arnoud Krabbius
arnoud-krabbius.title: The Barbarian
arnoud-krabbius.description: Arnoud is a big, muscular half-orc. He loves fighting, using his gigantic two handed broad axe. Although he is an impressive combatant, he is easily tricked when facing witty enemies.
arnoud-krabbius.backstory: Arnoud grew up in Arnhem, where 'Messentrekken' was a common move on the streets. This way he learned to always be ready for a fight.

joey-feed-r.name: Joey Feed'r
joey-feed-r.title: Longshot Lackey
joey-feed-r.description: He can throw a frikadel like no other.
joey-feed-r.backstory: Joey has always enjoyed food, and prefers to have breakfast that isn't particulary healthy. This passion for food gave him exceptional abilities when preparing future meals. He can throw any fast food with great power and accuracy.

spincent.name: Spincent
spincent.title: The Scary Spider
spincent.backstory: After an unfortunate event Spincent grew extra legs, at first this seemed like a disadvantage, but soon he evolved. This turned him into a spider who has the size and strength of a human.

forest-vault-key.name: Forest Vault Key
forest-vault-key.description: This key can be used to open the vault in the forest

bundker-reinforced-door-key.name: Bunker Reinforced Door Key
bundker-reinforced-door-key.description: This key can be used to open the Reinforced Door of the Bunker

bunny-hop-carrot.name: Bunny Hop Carrot
bunny-hop-carrot.description: After eating one of these carrots, you can jump up to 3 times higher than normal for 10 minutes.

gloves-of-crabby-power.name: Gloves of Crabby Power
gloves-of-crabby-power.description: The wearer of these gloves has greatly increased strength, allowing him/her to lift very heavy objects.
